languages.text: "Неужели только угроза смерти способна заставить вас соблюдать собственные законы? То, что иные разумные существа понимают интуитивно, вы насаждаете насилием".
languages.translation_comment: Palace of Justice, after judging the RT's subjects. Examining the Lex Imperialis codices.

traits.locale_text: "Неужели только угроза смерти способна заставить вас соблюдать собственные законы? То, что иные разумные существа понимают интуитивно, вы насаждаете насилием".

languages.text: "Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."
languages.translation_comment: Palace of Justice, after judging the RT's subjects. Examining the Lex Imperialis codices.
languages.original_text: "Неужели только угроза смерти способна заставить вас соблюдать собственные законы? То, что иные разумные существа понимают интуитивно, вы насаждаете насилием".

traits.locale_text: "Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."
"Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."
"Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."
"Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."
"Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."
"Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."

languages.text: 「死の脅威だけが、お前たちに自らの法を守らせる手段なのか？他の知性ある種族が直感的に理解していることを、お前たちは暴力によって強制しているのだな」
languages.original_text: "Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."

traits.locale_text: 「死の脅威だけが、お前たちに自らの法を守らせる手段なのか？他の知性ある種族が直感的に理解していることを、お前たちは暴力によって強制しているのだな」

languages.text: "Ist die Androhung der Todesstrafe das Einzige, das Euch dazu bringen kann, Eure eigenen Gesetze einzuhalten? Was andere intelligente Wesen intuitiv erkennen, erzwingt Ihr durch Gewalt."
languages.original_text: "Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."

traits.locale_text: "Ist die Androhung der Todesstrafe das Einzige, das Euch dazu bringen kann, Eure eigenen Gesetze einzuhalten? Was andere intelligente Wesen intuitiv erkennen, erzwingt Ihr durch Gewalt."

languages.text: « La menace de la mort est-elle la seule chose qui vous pousse à respecter vos propres lois ? Ce que les autres créatures intelligentes comprennent intuitivement, vous l'imposez par la violence. »
languages.original_text: "Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."

traits.locale_text: « La menace de la mort est-elle la seule chose qui vous pousse à respecter vos propres lois ? Ce que les autres créatures intelligentes comprennent intuitivement, vous l'imposez par la violence. »

languages.text: «¿Es la amenaza de muerte lo único que puede obligaros a cumplir vuestras propias leyes? Lo que otras criaturas inteligentes comprenden de manera intuitiva, vosotros lo imponéis a base de violencia».
languages.original_text: "Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es la amenaza de muerte lo único que puede obligaros a cumplir vuestras propias leyes? Lo que otras criaturas inteligentes comprenden de manera intuitiva, vosotros lo imponéis a base de violencia».

languages.text: “难道只有靠死亡的威胁，才能让你们遵守你们自己的法律吗？其他智能生物单凭直觉就能意识到这一切，而你们却要靠暴力强制实施。”
languages.original_text: "Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."

traits.locale_text: “难道只有靠死亡的威胁，才能让你们遵守你们自己的法律吗？其他智能生物单凭直觉就能意识到这一切，而你们却要靠暴力强制实施。”

languages.text: "Ancak ölümle burun buruna geldiğinizde mi yasalara uymak aklınıza geliyor? Diğer yaratıkların içgüdüleriyle sezdiklerini şiddet yoluyla uyguluyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak ölümle burun buruna geldiğinizde mi yasalara uymak aklınıza geliyor? Diğer yaratıkların içgüdüleriyle sezdiklerini şiddet yoluyla uyguluyorsunuz."

languages.original_text: "Is the threat of death the only thing that can make you abide by your own laws? What other sentient creatures realise intuitively, you enforce through violence."
